mapper.select: SELECT ec.id AS courseId, ec.title, ec.price, ec.reduction_money, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, ec.cover, et.name AS teacherName, es1.title AS oneSubjectTitle, es2.title AS twoSubjectTitle, ecd.description FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId} ;

SELECT ec.id, ec.teacher_id AS teacherId, ec.subject_id AS subjectId, ec.subject_parent_id AS subjectParentId, ec.title, ec.price, ec.reduction_money AS reductionMoney, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, ec.cover, ec.buy_count AS buyCount, ec.view_count AS viewCount, ecd.description, ec.gmt_create AS gmtcreate, ec.status FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId} ;
